q: She bought ___ new printer yesterday.
expl: ไม่เฉพาะเจาะจง → a.

q: We need ___ approval from the board before launching.
expl: approval ไม่เฉพาะเจาะจง → a.

q: Our office is located ___ the 12th floor.
expl: ชั้นของอาคาร → on the 12th floor.

q: He has worked here ___ 2019.
expl: since + จุดเวลา / for + ระยะเวลา.

q: The supplier ___ the parts yesterday.
expl: yesterday → past simple.

q: She ___ to the new policy already.
expl: Present perfect กับ already.

q: If the price ___ lower, more customers would sign up.
expl: สมมติปัจจุบัน → were.

q: Unless you ___ your password, you can't log in.
expl: Unless + present simple.

q: We need to ___ a meeting with the client.
expl: set a meeting.

q: They will ___ a presentation tomorrow.
expl: give a presentation.

q: Her ___ to detail is impressive.
expl: คำนาม attention.

q: We saw a significant ___ in sales.
expl: a significant increase.

q: Sales fell last quarter; ___, we must revise our plan.
expl: ผลลัพธ์ → as a result.

q: The device is cheap; ___, it is durable.
expl: เติมข้อมูล → moreover.

q: If you ___ earlier, you would have caught the bus.
expl: เงื่อนไขที่ 3 → had + V3.

q: We need to ___ a meeting with the client.
expl: set a meeting.

q: We saw a significant ___ in sales.
expl: a significant increase.

q: If the price ___ lower, more customers would sign up.
expl: สมมติปัจจุบัน → were.

q: [Cloze] Thank you for your (___1___) to this project. Your (___2___) efforts have made a real difference.  — Blank 1
expl: เติมคำที่เหมาะสมในบริบทธุรกิจ
